程序包 org.cyy.fw.android.dborm.sqlite

Provide the SQLite ORM scheme and DB Access API, Expose the SqliteDBFacade for users
User need to extend it and do a few things more: (1).Name the DB, android will create the specified DB file in the databases folder of the application (2).Implement the configureORMClasses() method, configure all mapped POJO classes, the DB will create tables according to this configured classes

请参阅: 说明

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    DBAccessTemplate.IDBAccessLogic<T>
    DB Accessing logic
    DBAutoUpgradeAdapter
    The adapter of auto-upgrade tables
    It should be implemented by the user's facade if the user want to the framework check the table's alteration and upgrade the tables automatically while DB upgrades, otherwise user must implement the SqliteDBFacade.onUpgrade(SQLiteDatabase, int, int) for upgrading logic.
    ValueConvertor
    Convert between Java value and DB value
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    ContentValuesBuilder  
    DBAccessTemplate
    DB Accessing template
    Extract some common codes for accessing DB, such as will call SqliteDBFacade#beginTransaction() when begin to access table, will call SQLiteDatabase#setTransactionSuccessful() after accessing successfully, and will call SQLiteDatabase#endTransaction() to end the logic.
    QueryAidParameter
    Aid parameter
    Including group by, order by, having, limit, distinct and so on
    SqliteDBFacade
    SQLite DB Accessed Facade, called by application code.
  • 枚举概要 
    枚举 说明
    SqliteDataType
    Data type supported by SQLite DB
    Including:NULL,INTEGER,REAL,TEXT,BLOB

程序包org.cyy.fw.android.dborm.sqlite的说明

Provide the SQLite ORM scheme and DB Access API, Expose the SqliteDBFacade for users
User need to extend it and do a few things more: (1).Name the DB, android will create the specified DB file in the databases folder of the application (2).Implement the configureORMClasses() method, configure all mapped POJO classes, the DB will create tables according to this configured classes
